attributes.action: Fund research into Topical Steroid Withdrawal (TSW)
attributes.additional_details:
Patients are reporting adverse effects from using topical steroids. More evidence-based research needs to be done to understand this condition and prevent further suffering.

Stories of those suffering and living the reality of TSW can be found here:
https://www.itsan.org/stories-and-photos/
attributes.background: Topical steroid withdrawal (TSW) remains unrecognised as an official condition by the NHS, and sufferers feel they have been misdiagnosed as a result.
